thread.section_title: Clothes2order.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.clothes2order.com
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
I placed a last-minute order for next-day delivery. I was contacted about my image for my t-shirt print not being of high enough resolution to achieve a good result - which was my fault as I knew this to be an important point.
After quick but useful communication I was able to send through a different and higher resolution image, which was still printed and despatched/delivered the next day as I needed it. The product is exactly as I needed in terms of size, quality etc. I would use this company and service again.
